items.sentence: No one has ever been able to solve this problem.
I\'m going to go to sleep as soon as I get home.
I\'m going to introduce you to my mother-in-law.
I\'m looking for a bank. Is there one near here?
Tom thought Mary knew where to buy black pepper.
Tom thought he was going to get a higher salary.
Tom told Mary not to go out at night by herself.
I don\'t really know anybody in town except Tom.
I should probably let Tom sleep a little longer.
I should talk to Tom before I decide what to do.
